Source code for havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.qsfp_dominfo_lib

# Library for reading DOM information.

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
import re

# Runs wedge_qsfp_util on the host. Extracts require fields and return
# back dictionary. Sample output of the wedge_qsfp_util at P57136534

[docs]def get_qsfp_util_details(self, host, port):
        command = "/usr/local/bin/wedge_qsfp_util"
        command = command + " " + str(port)
        raw_qsfp_dom = host.run(command, ignore_status=True)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary = {}

        if "not present" in raw_qsfp_dom:
            self.log_info("Information could not be retrived for port %s" %
                            str(port))
            return None

        cdr = re.search(r'TX:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        cdr_support = cdr.group(0)
        match = re.search(r"TX:\s+\w+", cdr_support)
        TX_cdr_support = match.group(0).split()[1]
        match = re.search(r"RX:\s+\w+", cdr_support)
        RX_cdr_support = match.group(0).split()[1]
        match = re.search(r'ID:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['ID'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Status:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Status'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Fault:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Fault'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Temp:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Temp'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Vcc:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Vcc'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Rx\sPower:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Rx_Power'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Tx\sBias:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Tx_Bias'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Reserved\sSet\s3:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Tx_Reserved_Set_3'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Reserved\sSet\s4:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Tx_Reserved_Set_4'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Reserved\sSet\s5:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Tx_Reserved_Set_5'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Vendor\sDefined:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['InterruptFlag_Vendor_Defined'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Temperature:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Temperature'] = match.group(1).strip('C')
        match = re.search(r'Supply\s+Voltage:\s+(\d+\.\d+\sV)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['SupplyVoltage'] = match.group(1).strip('V')
        match = re.search(r'TX\s+disable\s+bits:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['TX_disable_bits'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'RX\s+rate\s+select\s+bits:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom, )
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['RX_rate_select_bits'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Rate\s+select\s+is\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom, )
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Rate_select'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'TX\s+rate\s+select\s+bits:\s(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['TX_rate_select_bits'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Connector:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Connector'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Spec\s+compliance:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Spec_compliance'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Encoding:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Encoding'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Nominal\s+Bit\s+Rate:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Nominal_Bit_Rate'] = match.group(1).strip('MBps').strip()
        match = re.search(r'Ext\s+rate\s+select\s+compliance:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Ext_rate_select_compliance'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Device\s+Tech:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Device_Tech'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Ext\s+Module:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Ext_Module'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Wavelength\s+tolerance:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Wavelength_tolerance'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Max\s+case\s+temp:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Max_case_temp'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'CC_BASE:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['CC_BASE'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Options:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Options'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'DOM\s+Type:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['DOM_Type'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Enhanced\s+Options:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Enhanced_Options'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Reserved:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Reserved'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'CC_EXT:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['CC_EXT'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Vendor:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Vendor'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Vendor\s+PN:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Vendor_PN'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Vendor\s+Rev:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Vendor_Rev'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Vendor\s+SN:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Vendor_SN'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'Date\s+Code:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['Date_Code'] = match.group(1)
        match = re.search(r'CDR bits:\s+(.*)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['CDR_bits'] = match.group(1)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['CDR_Tx_support'] = TX_cdr_support
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['CDR_Rx_support'] = RX_cdr_support

        match = re.search(r'Channel\s+1:\s+(\d+\.\d+mW)\s+(\d+\.\d+mA)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_1_rx_power'] = match.group(1)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_1_tx_bias'] = match.group(2)

        match = re.search(r'Channel\s+2:\s+(\d+\.\d+mW)\s+(\d+\.\d+mA)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_2_rx_power'] = match.group(1)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_2_tx_bias'] = match.group(2)

        match = re.search(r'Channel\s+3:\s+(\d+\.\d+mW)\s+(\d+\.\d+mA)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_3_rx_power'] = match.group(1)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_3_tx_bias'] = match.group(2)

        match = re.search(r'Channel\s+4:\s+(\d+\.\d+mW)\s+(\d+\.\d+mA)', raw_qsfp_dom)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_4_rx_power'] = match.group(1)
        qsfp_dom_dictionary['channel_4_tx_bias'] = match.group(2)

        return qsfp_dom_dictionary




[docs]def check_supply_voltage(
        supply_voltage,
        supply_voltage_minimum,
        supply_voltage_maximum):
    match = re.search(r"(\d+\.\d+).*", supply_voltage)
    supply_voltage_value = match.group(1)
    status = float(supply_voltage_minimum) <= float(supply_voltage_value)
    status = status and (float(supply_voltage_value) <= float(supply_voltage_maximum))
    return status



# The function assumes fboss is installed. Return all the port details in the
# form of a dictionary. Sample fboss output at P57174442

[docs]def get_port_status(host):
    cmd = '/usr/local/bin/fboss port status'
    portstat = host.run(cmd, ignore_status=False)
    portstat = portstat.splitlines()
    port_details = {}
    group = re.search(r'/\d+/', portstat[-1])
    lastport = group.group(0).strip('/')
    # First two lines of the output has fields
    totalports = int(lastport)
    for i in range(1, totalports + 1):
        patern = r'/%d/' % i
        port_details[i] = {}
        for line in portstat[2:]:
            output = re.search(patern, line)
            if output:
                out = re.findall(r'\S+', line)
                if len(out) == 4 and out[2].lower() == 'down':
                    out.insert(3, None)
                port_details[i][out[0]] = {
                    "state": out[1],
                    "link": out[2],
                    "transceiver": out[3],
                    "speed": out[4],
                }
    return port_details
